mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, access_flags, method_name, full_method, simple_return_type, return_type from lv_invoke_method_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_method_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, access_flags, method_name, full_method, simple_return_type, return_type) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{methodHash}, #{simpleClassName}, #{accessFlags}, #{methodName}, #{fullMethod}, #{simpleReturnType}, #{returnType})

insert into lv_invoke_method_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, access_flags, method_name, full_method, simple_return_type, return_type) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.methodHash}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.accessFlags}, #{entity.methodName}, #{entity.fullMethod}, #{entity.simpleReturnType}, #{entity.returnType})

insert into lv_invoke_method_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, method_hash, simple_class_name, access_flags, method_name, full_method, simple_return_type, return_type) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.methodHash}, #{entity.simpleClassName}, #{entity.accessFlags}, #{entity.methodName}, #{entity.fullMethod}, #{entity.simpleReturnType}, #{entity.returnType})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), method_hash = values(method_hash), simple_class_name = values(simple_class_name), access_flags = values(access_flags), method_name = values(method_name), full_method = values(full_method), simple_return_type = values(simple_return_type), return_type = values(return_type)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_method_info
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
method_hash = #{methodHash},
simple_class_name = #{simpleClassName},
access_flags = #{accessFlags},
method_name = #{methodName},
full_method = #{fullMethod},
simple_return_type = #{simpleReturnType},
return_type = #{returnType},
where id = #{id}
